about_the_game:
In this 2D fighter you must rescue humanity from a cruel, merciless, bloodthirsty dictator aspiring to world hegemony.

After Mr. Donya (the president of America) has been threatened by Fxxkable Kim (the dictator of a distant kingdom called Nastychickea), the Pentagon entrusted a secret mission to its best agent. Having flown to Nastychickea, the agent discovered the location of an enemy’s nuclear weapons factory and occupied it, whereupon sneaked into Fxxkable Kim’s den and fought the cruel dictator.

This game combines two genres: fighter and visual novel. A story alternates with fights where hand-to-hand combat with a few characters within an arena is simulated. Fighting for various characters against various opponents, discover how the confrontation with the bloodthirsty dictator will be over.

In this 2D fighter you must rescue humanity from a cruel, merciless, bloodthirsty dictator aspiring to world hegemony.

After Mr. Donya (the president of America) has been threatened by Fxxkable Kim (the dictator of a distant kingdom called Nastychickea), the Pentagon entrusted a secret mission to its best agent. Having flown to Nastychickea, the agent discovered the location of an enemy’s nuclear weapons factory and occupied it, whereupon sneaked into Fxxkable Kim’s den and fought the cruel dictator.

This game combines two genres: fighter and visual novel. A story alternates with fights where hand-to-hand combat with a few characters within an arena is simulated. Fighting for various characters against various opponents, discover how the confrontation with the bloodthirsty dictator will be over.
name: Fxxkable Kim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 October 2018 Update: version 1809
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster Intel®-compatible processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX® 12 and WDDM® 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel® High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 11 2024 Update: version 24H2
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster Intel®-compatible, 64-bit, multi-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek® ALC1320
